verbose_text: However, due to the large amount of 239 +240 Pu (about 8.7x10 13 Bq) released from the Chernobyl accident XREF_BIBR, the activity ratio of 241 Pu / 239 +240 Pu of the Chernobyl accident (83 +/-5) XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR is much lower than that of the Fukushima DNPP accident (107.8, average of S2 and S3 litter, 241 Pu decay corrected to March 15, 2011).
